projects.title: pxlsrt
projects.description: pxlsrt is a long running project of mine, working on it when inspiration strikes. pxlsrt uses a generative art method called pixel sorting to create neat effects on images.

projects.title: acidity
projects.description: acidity was an excuse to try out the new Crystal language. It uses a very simple image modification algorithm to create interesting effects.

projects.title: Nilbog
projects.description: Nilbog started out as a "what-if" experiment. It uses mutation observers to revert DOM manipulation on a page. Its only real application is ad-blocking.

projects.title: Alchemize
projects.description: Alchemize is another mutation observer experiment in the same vein as Nilbog, although much simpler. Developers can use Alchemize to intercept newly added nodes and perform actions on them or trigger simple reactions.
